message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a method for continual learning using Bayesian Neural Networks, which is a popular topic in the machine learning community. The paper focuses on addressing the catastrophic forgetting problem, which is a common issue in continual learning scenarios. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). The paper also uses MNIST and UCR time-series datasets, which are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) research. Therefore, these two sub-categories are also likely.
